name: Single Tier Bee & Insect Hotel
description:
This Bee & Insect Hotel is ideal for hanging in a sheltered garden, house wall or orchard.
It is designed primarily to be used by solitary bees such as Mason Bees or Leafcutter Bees, which are non aggressive and excellent for pollinating in the garden, helping to increase fruit yields.
The strong roof and solid timber construction also give excellent insulation for over wintering Ladybirds and Lacewings.
Site using the supplied hanger in a sheltered spot, preferably to catch the morning sun, and to keep the rain from flooding the bees bedrooms!

Colours are listed as shown in the second picture. They are listed from left to right, starting from the top row.

name: Bee City, Cityscape for Bees
description:
Founded in 1764 on the banks of the Osmia river, Bee City has grown into a bustling metropolis of insect life. Skyscrapers line the sky, filled with all the species that work and live here. The huge range of habitats here allow a great variety of residents to move in, from Mason and Leafcutter Bees, to Ladybirds and Lacewings and many others too.


I've built this city from the ground up using solid FSC mahogany boards to construct the buildings, with the backdrop cut out of FSC softwood. I've then triple coated each layer before finishing construction and then filled each skyscraper with different combinations of drilled wood, cane, bamboo and bark.

This piece will not only be great for filling your garden with useful pollinators, but will make a great feature piece too. I've installed hidden hangers in the back to allow for easy placement on a wall.
This should be sited to catch full sun if possible.

name: Two Tier Bee Hotel
description:
Why not help fill your garden with life with this gorgeous Bee Hotel?
Bees everywhere are in decline so why not do your bit to help them out with this bee hotel? I've designed it primarily for solitary bees such as Leafcutter and Mason bees, but it will also get used by other insects such as lacewings, ladybirds and maybe even a spider or two.
It's a great way of helping out these little pollinators.
I include an information sheet on how to site and look after your Bee Hotel.

name: Large Bee Hotel
description:
Your garden will soon be buzzing with this great bug house.

This insect habitat is ideal for hanging in a sheltered garden, house wall or orchard.
It is designed primarily to be used by solitary bees such as Mason Bees or Leafcutter Bees, which are non aggressive and excellent for pollinating in the garden, helping to increase fruit yields.
The strong roof and solid timber construction also give excellent insulation for over wintering Ladybirds and Lacewings.
Site using the supplied hanger in a sheltered spot, preferably to catch the sun, and to keep the rain from flooding the bees bedrooms!

name: The Birds and the Bees
description:
The Birds and the Bees.

Fed up of awkward questions? Finally, an easy way to explain nature to the kids...

Please check the drop down menu to see what colours are currently available.
This set includes a bird box and a bee hotel, to help fill your garden with the wonders of nature. The bird box is made from solid wood and comes with a 28mm hole, to attract the biggest range of different birds.
The Bee Hotel will help attract all types of insects to your garden, which can help with pollenation of your fruit and veg. Investigating the different types of creatures is also a great way to help children learn about the wonders of nature.

Bird box is 12cm wide x 14cm deep x 23cm high.

Bee Hotel is 17cm x 12cm x 10cm. (Roof 19cm x 12cm)

name: Three Tier Bee Hotel
description:
This insect habitat is ideal for hanging in a sheltered garden, house wall or orchard.
It is a general insect habitat that may be used by solitary bees such as Mason Bees or Leafcutter Bees, which are non aggressive and excellent for pollinating in the garden, helping to increase fruit yields.
The durable roof and solid timber construction give excellent insulation for over wintering Ladybirds and Lacewings.
Site using the supplied hanger in a sheltered spot, preferably to catch the morning sun, and to keep the rain from flooding the bees bedrooms.

name: Deluxe Hedgehog House
description:
This Hedgehog House is for the most discerning hedgehog.

If you're looking for a way to help out your local wildlife, then this could be the answer. The Hedgehog house has been designed to keep the occupant safe as they over winter, and to give them a 'year-round' safehouse where predators can't get to them.
The entrance tunnel into the shelter prevents cats, dogs, and foxes from getting in, while allowing easy access for the hedgehog.
There is a removable back panel to allow easy access for cleaning of the house.
All interior woodwork is untreated.
The hedgehog house is aprox 65cm long, 55cm wide and 50cm high.
These are all made to order, and will ship aprox 10 days after purchase

name: Double Insect Factory
description:
Double Insect Factory

Welcome to the Insect Factory, the ideal insect production facility for your garden.

This is a fantastic habitat that is designed to be used by solitary bees such as Mason Bees or Leafcutter Bees, which are non aggressive and excellent for pollinating in the garden, helping to increase fruit yields.The solid timber construction gives excellent insulation for over wintering Ladybirds and Lacewings. Site using the supplied hangers in a sheltered spot, preferably to catch the sun, and to keep the rain from flooding the bees bedrooms.

Measures: Double Insect Factory is aprox25cm wide, 22cm high and 9cm deep.

name: Four Tier Bee Hotel
description:
This insect habitat is ideal for hanging in a sheltered garden, house wall or orchard.
It is a general insect habitat that may be used by solitary bees such as Mason Bees or Leafcutter Bees, which are non aggressive and excellent for pollinating in the garden, helping to increase fruit yields.
The durable roof and solid timber construction give excellent insulation for over wintering Ladybirds and Lacewings.
Site using the supplied hanger in a sheltered spot, preferably to catch the morning sun, and to keep the rain from flooding the bees bedrooms.

name: Ceramic Seed & Nut Bird Feeder
description:
A Ceramic Bird Feeder, ideal for Seeds, Nuts, Suet feeds and Scraps.

This modern and elegant feeder is a great way to attract birds to your garden. Simply hang in a suitable place with the supplied hanger and fill with your choice of food! Please check the drop down menu to see what colours are currently available. These will make a gorgeous addition to your garden!

The wide opening gives easy access for a wide range of birds, while the glaze makes it very easy to keep clean. There are drainage holes in the bottom of the feeder to help keep the food dry.

The feeder is aprox. 18cm in height and 14cm in diameter. Comes with strong wire hanger.

name: USA Small Bee Hotel
description:
This Bee Hotel is only available for sale to the USA & Canada.

Your yard will soon be buzzing with this great bug house.
This insect habitat is ideal for hanging in a sheltered yard, orchard or on a house wall.
It is designed primarily to be used by solitary bees such as Mason Bees or Leafcutter Bees, which are non aggressive and excellent for pollinating the plants in your yard, helping to increase fruit yields.
The strong roof and solid timber construction also give excellent insulation for over wintering Ladybugs and Lacewings.
Site using the supplied hanger in a sheltered spot, preferably to catch the sun, and to keep the rain from flooding the bees bedrooms!

*****This model is suitable for the USA and Canada. For Bee Hotels suitable for European countries please check out the other shop sections.*****

Size: Aprox 7" high, 5" wide and 31/2" deep. (Roof is 8" wide x 5" deep.)

name: Ceramic Fat Ball Bird Feeder
description:
A Ceramic Bird Feeder for Suet Fat Balls.

This modern and elegant feeder is a great way to attract birds to your garden. Simply hang in a suitable place with the supplied hanger and hang a bagged Suet Fat Ball from the internal hook! This comes supplied with 3 balls so that you can start using it straight away.

Please check the drop down menu to see what colours are currently available.

The feeder is just under 10cm in height and 8cm in diameter.

name: Single Insect Factory
description:
Welcome to the Insect Factory, the ideal insect production facility for your garden.

This insect habitat is ideal for hanging in a sheltered garden, orchard, or on a house wall.

This is a fantastic habitat that is designed to be used by solitary bees such as Mason Bees or Leafcutter Bees, which are non aggressive and excellent for pollinating in the garden, helping to increase fruit yields.The solid timber construction gives excellent insulation for over wintering Ladybirds and Lacewings.Site using the supplied hangers in a sheltered spot, preferably to catch the morning sun, and to keep the rain from flooding the bees bedrooms.

Measures: Single Insect Factory is aprox 17.5cm wide, 22cm high and 9cm deep.

name: Standard Hedgehog House
description:
If you're looking for a way to help out your local wildlife, then this could be the answer.

The wooden hedgehog house has been designed to keep the occupant safe as they over winter, and to give them a 'year-round' safehouse where predators can't get to them.

The entrance tunnel into the shelter prevents cats, dogs, and foxes from getting in, while allowing easy access for the hedgehog. The roof can be lifted off to allow easy access for cleaning of the house. It's best to site this in a quiet corner of your garden, where the hedgehog can hibernate undisturbed.

The hedgehog house is aprox L50cm x W50cm x H25cm

name: Ceramic Feeder Set
description:
A pair of Ceramic Bird Feeders, one for suet balls and the the other for seeds, nuts and scraps.

These modern and elegant feeders are a great way to attract birds to your garden. Simply hang them in a suitable place with their supplied hangers and fill with your choice of food! Please check the drop down menu to see what colours are currently available. These will make a gorgeous addition to your garden!
The wide opening on the seed feeder gives easy access for a wide range of birds, while the glaze makes it very easy to keep clean. There are drainage holes in the bottom of the feeder to help keep the food dry.
The suet ball feeder comes with an internal hook to easily attach bagged suet balls.

name: Bird Box
description: This solid wood bird box will have the birds flocking to your garden. This box is suitable for even the smallest garden and is easy to install using its pre-drilled fixing holes. It comes with a 28mm hole to allow a large range of birds to use the box. The base has drainage holes to keep the nest dry, and the lid is attached with screws to allow easy access for cleaning. Inside, there is a 'ladder' to allow the chicks to get out, and ventilation slots along the roof. The box has been treated with Non Toxic, water based paint that is safe for birds.

name: Bat Box
description:
This bat box is a great way to help out your local bats. Made from solid timber and fixed together with stainless steel screws, it's ready for them to take up residence. The back plate is grooved to allow the bats to grip it and climb up into the box where they can shelter from the weather or just hang out!

Comes with instructions of how best to site it and looking after the box. Bat boxes should be placed at least 5m off the ground in areas where bats have been seen, so do make sure you have a suitable location for it. It's also recommended to place them in groups of two or three boxes.

Backplate is aprox 35cm x 15cm. Box is aprox 25cm x 15cm x 15cm at the top

name: 'Build your own' Bird Box Kit
description:
'Build your own' Bird Box Kit,

This simple to do kit is a great way to provide a home for your local wildlife. Designed to be easy to assemble, yet make a strong and sturdy bird box, this can be easily put together in 10-15 minutes.

The kit is made from sawn timber which is treated to prevent decay. All fixings are supplied so all you'll need is a screwdriver and hammer.

The box is predrilled with a 28mm hole which will allow small birds to use it whilst keeping out larger birds.

Kit includes: 6 pieces of timber, roofing felt, screw, nails and an instruction sheet.

Gloves should be worn when making this kit. Not for children.

name: 'Build your own' Bat Box Kit
description:
This simple to make kit can be a great activity and a fun way to provide a home for your local wildlife too!

This kit has been designed to be easy to assemble, yet make a strong and sturdy bat box. This can easily be put together in 10-15 minutes and would be a fantastic activity with the kids!

Kit includes: 5 pieces of timber, roofing felt, self drilling screws, nails and an instruction sheet.

Gloves should be worn when making this kit.

Not suitable for young children.

This listing is for a single kit.

The kit is made from solid timber and all fixings are supplied so all you will need is a screwdriver and hammer. (An electric screwdriver can also be used with care.)

Dimensions:
W15 x D16 x H40cm
